alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 1:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Millard...central Juab and southeastern Tooele Counties through 215 PM MDT... At 144 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 23 miles northwest of Delta, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Millard...central Juab and southeastern Tooele Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Western Millard and Juab Counties
